ygData.subject: Re: Spell Sentinel
ygData.msgSnippet: You haven t used it since they fixed it then. It now lasts about 5 minutes, easily enough time to meditate to full mana from none. Also useful to keep tabs on
ygData.messageBody:
You haven't used it since they fixed it then. It now lasts about 5
minutes, easily enough time to meditate to full mana from none. Also
useful to keep tabs on a dangerous spawn spot such as the mino hero in
the Steamfont Mountains, provided you are close by ( in the caves ) and
can recast it every couple fights.

--- Mike Arnette <mike2@...> wrote:
> From: mike2@... (Mike Arnette)
>
> Of course, it barely lasts anytime at all, so I
> never use it.
>
> Chantro, the Rathe
> -----Original Message-----
> From: WeinisFROG@... <WeinisFROG@...>
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com

> ><< Does anyone know exactly what this spell does?
> >>
> >
> >you are supposed to use it before you go to med

> area
> >that way it gives a chance to get up and run away
> >
